name: Amor Doce: High School Life
description:
Sweet Love is a dating sim/romance game where the script totally adapts to the choices you make to have a unique love story! Come and be part of this episodic love game, which unites three otome games and a community of more than 9 million players!

New episodes are made available regularly. Collect costumes and images, participate in events and live a passionate story with your crush!

Choose the universe of your choice to live this unique romance: at Sweet Amoris school, at Anteros Academy college or directly in the active life Love Life!
